titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 79) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-352, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 79 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 118.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 323.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/20/2001--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.J. Res. 79 (FY 2002 continuing appropriations).
